entity.name: Andrew Yang
entity.description: Candidate for US President, Andrew Yang

text:
COVID-19 has shown, in technicolor, the true situation when it comes to income inequality in this country. This is one reason I've been looking closely at Universal Basic Income in recent weeks. @AndrewYang discussed this issue extensively.  

https://t.co/0RoJ89ky5E
